messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A known Syndicate Ship has been discovered in your sector. Be on watch.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Amos Llora (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Today the Library is starting a new Program! We have a lack of books. If anyone wants to come down to the library, come up to the meeting table, pictured, and write a book! Title it and everything and we will be able to slap it in a binder so everyone can read it! Come on down!</font>
